articles.title: Google to pay $6.126b after losing challenge against EU antitrust decision, wins 5 per cent fine cut - ABC News
articles.description: The General Court largely confirmed the European Commission's 2018 decision but trimmed Google's fine by 5 per cent to $6.126 billion because it disagreed with the EU competition enforcer on one point.
